p: Another anti-viral drug investigated by Gilead Sciences is remdesivir. The drug is believed to have potential activity against COVID-19 as “it has demonstrated in vitro and in vivo activity in animal models against MERS and SARS coronaviruses.” Gilead initiated two clinical trials on positive COVID-19 patients with mild and severe clinical manifestations separately. Patient enrolment started in February and it is anticipated for the results to be received in April [ 25].
